p: There are a number of reasons why COVID-19 may be associated with cardiovascular complications that include inter alia-specific aspects of SARS-CoV-2 structure and receptor targeting, and target cell location and its relationship with cardiovascular disease homeostasis. In addition, there are potential risk amplifiers including hitherto unanticipated interactions between viral targets within the host and established homeostatic pathways that may already be perturbed in patients with advanced cardiovascular disease.
